name: Zombies N' Guns
description:
Actual progress:

It's a simple zombie shooter that combines the weapons of the game and enemies spawning in waves.

The timer counts from 60 seconds to 0 and receives a 20 seconds bonus for each wave defeated.

Future progress:

With these mechanics fully pollyshed and in function, the game will be something more complex, with history, where the player will be a man against an entire mafia organization, with bosses and multiple scenarios.
